languages.text: "Кощунственные дикарские догадки вероятнее всего описывают какого-то из значимых машинных духов, продолжающих бодрствование. Запрашиваю беседу с единицей, идентифицированной как "шаман".
"The tribesman's profane speculations most likely describe an important machine spirit that remains awake. Requesting a conversation with the unit identified as 'the shaman.'"
languages.original_text: "Кощунственные дикарские догадки вероятнее всего описывают какого-то из значимых машинных духов, продолжающих бодрствование. Запрашиваю беседу с единицей, идентифицированной как "шаман".

traits.locale_text: "The tribesman's blasphemous speculations most likely describe an important machine spirit that remains awake. Requesting a conversation with the unit identified as 'the shaman.'"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The tribesman's profane speculations most likely describe an important machine spirit that remains awake. Requesting a conversation with the unit identified as 'the shaman.'"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「部族民の不敬な推測はほぼ間違いなく、重要な機械精霊が目覚めたままということを示しています。そのユニットに会話を求める行為が『祈祷師』とみなされたのです」
languages.original_text: "The tribesman's profane speculations most likely describe an important machine spirit that remains awake. Requesting a conversation with the unit identified as 'the shaman.'"

traits.locale_text: 「部族民の不敬な推測はほぼ間違いなく、重要な機械精霊が目覚めたままということを示しています。そのユニットに会話を求める行為が『祈祷師』とみなされたのです」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “根据部落民的亵渎猜测，这很可能是某个仍然运转的重要机魂。请求与被称为‘萨满’的单位对话。”
languages.original_text: "The tribesman's profane speculations most likely describe an important machine spirit that remains awake. Requesting a conversation with the unit identified as 'the shaman.'"

traits.locale_text: “根据部落民的亵渎猜测，这很可能是某个仍然运转的重要机魂。请求与被称为‘萨满’的单位对话。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Ces spéculations profanes décrivent très probablement un esprit de la machine encore en éveil. Je demande à converser avec l'unité identifiée comme le chaman. »
languages.original_text: "The tribesman's profane speculations most likely describe an important machine spirit that remains awake. Requesting a conversation with the unit identified as 'the shaman.'"

traits.locale_text: « Ces spéculations profanes décrivent très probablement un esprit de la machine encore en éveil. Je demande à converser avec l'unité identifiée comme le chaman. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Es posible que las especulaciones profanas de este miembro de la tribu describan a un importante espíritu máquina que permanece despierto. Solicitando conversación con la unidad identificada como "el chamán"».
languages.original_text: "The tribesman's profane speculations most likely describe an important machine spirit that remains awake. Requesting a conversation with the unit identified as 'the shaman.'"

traits.locale_text: «Es posible que las especulaciones profanas de este miembro de la tribu describan a un importante espíritu máquina que permanece despierto. Solicitando conversación con la unidad identificada como "el chamán"».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Die profanen Spekulationen des Stammesmannes beschreiben vermutlich einen wichtigen Maschinengeist, der noch immer wach ist. Erbitte eine Unterhaltung mit der Einheit mit der ID 'der Schamane'."
languages.original_text: "The tribesman's profane speculations most likely describe an important machine spirit that remains awake. Requesting a conversation with the unit identified as 'the shaman.'"

traits.locale_text: "Die profanen Spekulationen des Stammesmannes beschreiben vermutlich einen wichtigen Maschinengeist, der noch immer wach ist. Erbitte eine Unterhaltung mit der Einheit mit der ID 'der Schamane'."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Kabile üyesinin din dışı spekülasyonları; uyanık kalmış, önemli bir makine ruhuna işaret etmekte. 'Şaman' olarak tanımlanan birimle iletişim kurulmasını talep ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "The tribesman's profane speculations most likely describe an important machine spirit that remains awake. Requesting a conversation with the unit identified as 'the shaman.'"

traits.locale_text: "Kabile üyesinin din dışı spekülasyonları büyük ihtimalle, uyanık kalmış, önemli bir makine ruha işaret etmekte. 'Şaman' olarak tanımlanan birimle iletişim kurulmasını talep ediyorum."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
